overview:
Dewayne Johnson is Founder and CEO of MobileHaps, a company that allows users to find and RSVP for local events based on location. Dewayne is also the Managing Partner of BarChannels, an online and mobile app directory that helps users find sports bars best to watch their favorite teams play.

Prior to MobileHaps and Barchannels, Dewayne lived in the financial world, managing relationships on behalf of companies like Morgan Stanley and Citigroup. Additionally, Dewayne was previously a restaurateur, owning and overseeing several restaurants in New York and Maryland.

Dewayne proudly holds a B.S. from Coppin State University where he is an active alumnus
